label: conjunctive adverb
description: Adverb connecting words; phrases; clauses; or sentences.

label: discourse adverb
description: Adverb serving as a discourse marker.

label: evidential adverb
description: Adverb specifying speaker's attitude toward reliability; or the nature of evidence for a report.

label: grammatical adverb
description: Grammatical function word not falling into other categories.

label: manner adverb
description: Adverb specifying a way or manner.

label: adverb phrase
description: Group of words treated as a phrase.

label: adverb - unknown
description: Uninflected modifier or function word of unknown adverb classification.

label: quantitative adverb
description: Adverb specifying generally how much or how many.

label: gender neutral noun
description: Open class nominal; typically identifying things and beings; functions as both animate and inanimate gender.

label: noun phrase
description: Group of words treated as a phrase.

label: animate noun
description: Noun of the animate gender that is not obligatorily possessed.

label: dependent animate noun
description: Noun of the animate gender that is obligatorily possessed.

label: inanimate noun
description: Noun of the inanimate gender that is not obligatorily possessed.

label: dependent inanimate noun
description: Noun of the inanimate gender that is obligatorily possessed.

label: discourse particle
description: Particle serving as a discourse marker.

label: interjection particle
description: Particles of emotional; directional; or conversational function which may also stand alone as utterances.

label: particle - unknown
description: One of a minor class of uninflected words; of unknown classification.

label: demonstrative pronoun
description: Pronoun identify which one relative to positions.

label: pronoun phrase
description: Group of words treated as a phrase.

label: pausal pronoun
description: Pronoun serving as a generic or noun substitute in recall.

label: pronoun - unknown
description: Nominal words with limited class membership. Pronoun of unknown classification.

label: universal pronoun
description: Pronoun with universal quantifier such as (g)akina.

label: directional preverb
description: One of a positional class of preverbs of  location and direction. (pv2)

label: relative preverb
description: One of a positional class of preverbs relating the verb to other sentence or discourse elements. (pv3)

label: similative preverb
description: Preverb of kind or type used as prenoun.

label: tense/mode preverb
description: One of a positional class of adverbs of tense and mode. (pv1)

label: quantifier
description: Indicates amount and number; such as adverbs; particles; numbers; and preverbs.

label: verb phrase
description: Group of words treated as a phrase.

label: animate intransitive verb with object
description: Verb with an intransitive stem; an animate subject and an object.

label: animate intransitive verb
description: Verb with an intransitive stem; an animate subject and no object.

label: class 2 animate intransitive verb
description: Verb with a transitive stem (as for an inanimate object); an animate subject and no object; inflected as an intransitive.

label: inanimate intransitive verb
description: Verb with an intransitive stem; an inanimate subject and no object.

label: transitive animate verb
description: Verb with a transitive stem and an animate object.

label: transitive inanimate verb
description: Verb with a transitive stem; and an inanimate object; and a characteristic set of inflections.

label: class 2 transitive inanimate verb
description: Verb with a transitive stem; and an inanimate object; and a different characteristic set of inflections.

label: class 3 transitive inanimate verb
description: Verb with a transitive stem; and an inanimate object; and a different characteristic set of inflections.

label: class 4 transitive inanimate verb
description: Verb with a transitive stem; and an inanimate object; and a different characteristic set of inflections.
